main event: A UFO report from Project Blue Book on 28th June 1959 described a sighting of multiple flashing objects in the sky, initially thought to be meteors.
interesting points: The report is from Project Blue Book, a US Air Force study of UFO sightings.
The objects were initially identified as meteors, but then split into multiple 5-second flashes.
The sighting took place near Japan, at approximate coordinates 35-30N, 141-43E.
The report mentions sending a copy to the Cognizant Base in Omo and to CINCPACFLT (Commander in Chief, U.S. Pacific Fleet).
No photographs were included in the report.
